nodes.text: Ja'dan was a Human male captain who was stationed in the High Security Section of Belsavis prison, a Galactic Republic penal colony on the planet Belsavis, during the invasion of Belsavis by the Sith Empire during the Galactic War.
Captain Ja'dan appears as a Classic Gear Vendor for Republic players on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
